item.title: Kubernetes templating with Carvel ytt
item.description: Introduction Link to heading Hello again, this is another blog post about a great CNCF tool. If you’ve ever worked with Kubernetes manifests, you probably know that editing or creating them by hand can be very painful. On the other side, you as a developer or engineer don’t want to edit a lot in these manifests. It is usually better to edit the necessary parts and leave the rest as it was before.
